quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Newhart and Bob
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, mallory. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What actor played the part of orthodontist Jerry Robinson who has an office on the same floor as Bob on The Newhart Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter Bonerz

questions.question: Select the correct age order of these characters (not based on current stories but on their actual appearance on the show).
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Melissa, Janice, Hope then Jennifer

questions.question: Edward Mallory was the first and only Bill Horton.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: On The Newhart Show, Bill Daily played Bob and Emilys eccentric neighbor Howard Borden. On what other successful sitcom did he have a supporting role?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I Dream of Jeannie

questions.question: What type of doctor is Bob on The Newhart Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Psychologist

questions.question: What was the logic used by the Salem Strangler for choosing his victims?

options.text: There was no logic. They were in the right place at the wrong time.
He killed only hospital personnel he felt were responsible for his brothers death.
He killed men who slept with his true love.
He killed anyone he considered impure.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He killed anyone he considered impure.

questions.question: Heres an easy one: Andrea Barber, best known for her role as Kimmy Gibler on Full House was introduced to the people of Salem as Roman Bradys long lost daughter Carrie, back from the dead.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What was Howard Bordens profession on The Newhart Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Airline navigator

questions.question: What year did the Newhart Show go off the air?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1978

questions.question: How many children did Mickey Horton father?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 0

questions.question: Don Craig left Salem after a successful bid for the state senate?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is Bobs last name on The Newhart Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hartley

questions.question: Which of the following actors/personalities did not appear on Days Of Our Lives?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Crystal Gayle

questions.question: What was the Dragons reason for his murder spree?

options.text: The victims were all members of the royal family in the way between him and the throne of England.
There was no reason, he killed a specific type, no other reason.
The victims were all spies, spying on America.
The victims were all responsible for the death of his family.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The victims were all members of the royal family in the way between him and the throne of England.

questions.question: When Marlena was first introduced, what was everyone afraid Mickey would do to his new shrink?

options.text: Totally ignore her, he didnt think he needed a shrink.
Try to kill her, he was attacking blonde women.
Totally ignore her, she looked too much like Laura.
Try to fix her up with his best friend, Don Craig.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Try to kill her, he was attacking blonde women.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Xena and Dark Shadows
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, bobs, network. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Dark Shadows is the only long running soap opera that is not on video for home viewing.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Ghosts were introduced on the show Dark Shadows before the vampire.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Of Joxer, Xena and Gabrielle, who did not die at least once during the series Xena: Warrior Princess?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They all died

questions.question: Who played the part of Barnabus Collins in the series Dark Shadows.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jonathan Frid

questions.question: What was Princess Dianas biggest fear when trying to pretend to be Xena in the series Xena: Warrior Princess?

options.text: She wouldnt have servants to take care of her.
She had never left the palace before.
She was afraid that she would actually have to fight.
That the assassin would find her anyway.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She had never left the palace before.

questions.question: How many seasons did Xena: Warrior Princess grace the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 6

questions.question: Who played Bobs wife Emily on the 1970s sitcom The Newhart Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Suzanne Pleshette

questions.question: Which of the following has not been used by various characters in Xena: Warrior Princess to describe the chakrum?

options.text: Get real, no one would use any of these

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Disk of death

questions.question: What network originally aired Dark Shadows?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ABC

questions.question: In what major city does the 1970s sitcom The Newhart Show take place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chicago

questions.question: Marcia Wallce, who played Carol, Bobs receptionist on The Newhart Show, does the voice of what Simpsons character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Edna Krabappel

questions.question: There were three shows titled the Newhart Show from the 1960s to the 1990s.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The actress who played Emily Hartley on The Newhart Show also appeared in the movie The Birds.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: When did the occult classic Dark Shadows premiere?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1966

questions.question: Suzanne Pleshettes third marriage was to a cast member on one of the Newhart Shows. What was his name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Poston

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Feet and Drew Carey

questions.question: What company did Lewis work for on The Drew Carey Show?

questions.question: Drews brother Steve is a cross-dresser on The Drew Carey Show.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Where is Drews pool table located on the sitcom The Drew Carey Show?

options.text: He doesnt have a pool table.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In his backyard.

questions.question: What was Oswalds full name on The Drew Carey Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oswald Lee Harvey

questions.question: Tired, Meredith assists Burke with a heart transplant only to find out that her surgical glove ripped and she may have punctured the heart with her fingernail. Izzie throws a party at Merediths house for her new boyfriend so he can meet all her friends and then winds up missing the party because she gets stuck in surgery. This is the plot of which Greys Anatomy episode.

options.text: Winning a Battle, Losing the War

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shake Your Groove Thing

questions.question: Claire from the HBO series Six Feet Under had an abortion.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: On The Drew Carey Show, Drew often wears a Ghoulardi T-shirt on the show. Who is Ghoulardi?

options.text: a late night horror show host

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a late night horror show host

questions.question: What is Drews full name on The Drew Carey Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Drew Allison Carey

questions.question: In the TV series Six Feet Under, all of the following were Fisher siblings except for whom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lisa

questions.question: In this episode of Greys Anatomy, Alex meets Annie, a patient with an extraordinarily large tumor, and they become friendly. Annie trusts only Alex until she overhears him making fun of her. Derek chooses Meredith to help him with a grouchy Parkinsons patient. Bailey finds out about this and tries to make Merediths life hell.

options.text: The First Cut Is The Deepest

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: If Tomorrow Never Comes

questions.question: Who wrote Cleveland Rocks, one of the opening songs for the The Drew Carey Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ian Hunter

questions.question: Which character from Six Feet Under said this: Well, well. The prodigal returns. This is what youve been running away from your whole life, buddy boy. Scared the crap out of you when you were growing up, didnt it? And you thought youd escape, well guess what, nobody escapes.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nathaniel Fisher

questions.question: Drew and Kate were romantically involved at one point in The Drew Carey Show, but did not get married for what reason?

options.text: Drew got cold feet and left Kate at the altar.
Drew wanted children, but Kate did not.
Kate wanted children, but Drew did not.
Kate got cold feet and left Drew at the altar.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Drew wanted children, but Kate did not.

questions.question: On the TV show Six Feet Under, the patriarch of the Fisher household, Nathaniel Samuel Fisher, was killed by a gunshot wound to the chest.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What kind of drink was found in Lisas car after she went missing in Six Feet Under?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dr. Pepper

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Meredith and Episode
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, june, plot. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Despite the hospitals code black, and assistance from the bomb squad, the dangerous situation at Seattle Grace escalates. Meredith works with the bomb squad to save the lives of everyone in the hospital. Derek must perform surgery under pressure of learning that Meredith is the girl with the bomb. This is part of the plot of what episode of the medical drama Greys Anatomy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: As We Know It

questions.question: June Bennett starred on dark Shadows as Elizabeth Collins Stoddard from 1966-1970.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Was the Dark Shadows Theme written by Robert Cobert?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Cristina finds herself in charge of the ER. Time is running out for Denny. Derek comes to terms with the fact that a friends life is in his hands. This is part of the plot of which Greys Anatomy episode?

options.text: Deterioration of the Fight or Flight Response

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Deterioration of the Fight or Flight Response

questions.question: In this Greys Anatomy episode, Chief Webber calls a meeting with his staff about an outbreak of Syphillis at Seattle Grace. Izzie and Cristina wind up doing an unauthorized autopsy on a patient. Meredith and Derek get ready to go out on their first official date but are interrupted by an unexpected visitor: Dereks wife Addison.

options.text: The First Cut Is the Deepest

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Whos Zoomin Who

questions.question: Meredith has a one night stand with a guy named Steve, who winds up a patient at Seattle Grace for a very disturbing problem...he has an erection that wont go away. An expectant mother of quintuplets finds out that most of her unborn children have potentially life-threatening problems. This is the plot of which Greys Anatomy episode?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Much Too Much

questions.question: Meredith and Derek are in charge of treating a patient who needs life-saving surgery, only to find out that her father is very religious and very against the surgery without a visit from their shaman. Meredith finds out about her mothers affair with Chief Webber. George and Alex get stuck in an elevator with a patient who needs immediate surgery, which George performs with directions from Dr. Burke. All this happened in which episode of Greys Anatomy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bring the Pain

questions.question: How many episodes of the Dark Shadows program were made?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1245

questions.question: In this episode of the Greys Anatomy series, Meredith and the other interns report for their first day of work at Seattle Grace Hospital. Meredith finds out that her new boss, Derek Shepherd, is the man with whom she had a one night stand the previous night. Meredith and her fellow interns find out just how difficult life is for doctors, and what its like to work 48 hour shifts without any sleep.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Hard Days Night

questions.question: In this episode of the Greys Anatomy series, Izzie meets Denny Duquette, a patient that is awaiting a heart transplant. George treats a teenage hermaphrodite named Bex.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Begin the Begin

questions.question: In this episode of Greys Anatomy, Izzie interrogates George about his personal life. Addison takes Alex to task about a sensitive case. Burke has to deal with treating his musical hero.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Blues for Sister Someone

questions.question: In this Greys Anatomy episode, Meredith wakes up feeling like she is going to have a bad day. She turns out to be right when a patient arrives at the hospital with a bomb in his chest cavity, threatening the lives of the entire staff.

options.text: Its the End of the World

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Its the End of the World

questions.question: In this Greys Anatomy episode, Bonnie and Tom, two complete strangers, wind up as patients at Seattle Grace. They are both impaled to the same pole after an accident. Cristina is given the task of tracking down a patients missing leg. Alex begins to question his future as a doctor.

options.text: Raindrops Keep Falling on My Head

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Into You Like a Train

questions.question: In this episode of Greys Anatomy, the nurses union at Seattle Grace goes on strike, as does George, leaving the doctors to fend for themselves. Meredith makes a critical mistake while treating a patient, which is witnessed by the patients friends. Izzie confides a big secret from her past to a young pregnant woman.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Break on Through

questions.question: Which Greys Anatomy episode has the following plot?

options.text: What Have I Done to Deserve This?
Grandma Got Run Over by a Reindeer

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: What Have I Done to Deserve This?
